page.title: 09FARMING-RAMPSIDE HALL
page.content: The second barn was burnt to the ground. He now has a modern,metal barn. He doesnt use artifical manure.The only crops he grows are for the animals,hay is the crop he grows .He doesnt grow any vegetables for himself and he makes cream for himself.His cows range in price from Â£30-Â£60.His land is quite a distance from his farm.There was one week at the gas terminal when there were strange smells.He rents a little land in the summer for grazing his cows.He rented out 25 acres of his land for 11 months but he can have the land back at any time.He has a bull pen and several buildings to keep new born calves in.He also has 3 rooms for his milking. He has had no trouble with insects and disease at all.They keep their calves in for a month after they are born.
